name: Condor (Spooky Games)
description:
Would you dare to jump from the cliff and free-fall for your life? Looks like there is no other choice in Condor, a game of bravery, self-preservation and swag, set in the universe of our upcoming game: Sacrifices.

Please remember this is only a web demo. In order to enjoy the best glitch-free experience (alongside achievements, leaderboards and enhanced visual effects), please head over to our apps on your favorite mobile store.

Follow us!

https://www.spooky.games

https://twitter.com/spookygamesyeah

https://www.facebook.com/spookygamesstudio
